description:
Fiverr has become a popular site. It has seen tremendous growth in the services provided on it. With this growth comes increases competition. How do you become successful with the site? Part of the answer comes with finding the right niche.

This course will help you develop an understanding of how to choose a niche based on your background. It will show you how you can identify your expertise and interests and develop a great gig from it.

The course is divided into three sections consisting of ten lessons. The first section looks at identifying a niche and using it on the Fiverr platform.. The second section looks at strategies of developing a gig in your chosen niche. the third presents some examples of niche areas.

Success on Fiverr may start with developing the right gig. The right gig means fuinding the right niche. The course can help you find it.
title: Use Fiverr To Discover Your Niche
